name: Alien
text: I can carry a teammate around on my ship.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) and RELEASE to carry a teammate in my ship.

name: Alpaca
text: I spit on others to make them sticky.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to spit on other to make them sticky.

name: Dog
text: I bark and send an echo.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to woof and echo.

name: Elephant
text: I charge up ahead to smash glass walls.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to charge up and RELEASE to smash walls ahead.

name: Hedgehog
text: I make my surroundings sticky.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to make your surroundings sticky.

name: Mouse
text: I run the mouse wheels and I'm a lightweight.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to run the wheels. I'm a lightweight

name: Music Box
text: I sing my lungs out in all directions.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to sing my lungs out in all directions.

name: Owl
text: I glide with style.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to glide.

name: Pig
text: I attract Fruit like a magnet.
unlockedText: I attract Fruit like a magnet.

name: Turtle
text: I shell in to protect myself and others, and to reduce Halo loss
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to shell up and be safe from dangers

name: Umbrella
text: Locked:I can unfold to protect others from dangers.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to deploy and protect your mates from dangers.

name: Aquarium
text: I can welcome a teammate on my bowl.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) and release to carry a teammate around on my bowl.

name: Armadillo
text: I am immune to anything pointy when I move
unlockedText: I am immune to anything pointy when I move.

name: Blowfish
text: I blow to smash glass walls.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to blow away. Also destroys tombstones.

name: Bulldog
text: I can sing in all directions at once.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to bark and Sing in all directions.

name: Camel
text: I carry up to 5 items.
unlockedText: I carry up to 5 items at once.

name: Compass
text: My needle points to the closest remaining Fruit.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to point at the closest remaining fruit.

name: Frog
text: I jump three times in a row.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to jump three times in a row.

name: Lion
text: My tombstone gives a singing boost. I also sing in all directions.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to sing in all direction. My tombstone gives a singing boost.

name: Spring
text: I can charge up and throw others in the air.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to charge and RELEASE to propel others up in the air.

name: Teapot
text: I shine a steamy light and send light drops to reveal the world.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to steam out and spit light drops in any direction.

name: Watering Can
text: I water tombstones and grow all the flowers.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to water tombstones and flowers.

name: Guinea Pig
text: I run the guinea pig-wheels. Yes, that's their real name. .
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to run the wheels.

name: Anchor
text: I smash the ground with my behind to destroy glass walls.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) in mid-air to smash the ground.

name: Duck
text: I quack and send an echo.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to quack and echo

name: Bison
text: I charge up ahead and destroy glass walls.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to charge up and RELEASE to smash walls ahead.

name: Cactus
text:
I make my surroundings sticky.

 Unlocked: HOLD (button prompt) to make my surroundings sticky.

name: Cat
text: Like all cats, I can dash.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to dash ahead like there's no tomorrow.

name: Lantern
text: I blast my beam of light.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to enlighten like no other.

name: Pepper
text: I spice up fire-pits.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to ignite fire-pits.

name: Raptor
text: I run like the wind.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to Run like the wind.

name: Seashell
mission2: Help 20 mates up with your shell
text: I stick to walls and deploy my shell for others to climb on.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to stick on walls or objects & create a platform

name: Spider
text: I pull a string from a Web for others to climb on, and I'm a lightweight!
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to pull down a string from a Web.

name: Squirrel
text: I run squirrel-wheels.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to run the wheels.

name: Whale
text: I can blow water in the air that others can climb on.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to spit water upwards that teammates can climb on

name: Bell
text: I ring to destroy glass walls.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to ding dong. Destroys walls and tombstones alike!

name: Clover
text: My tombstone is a gift machine and I enhance Bonuses.
unlockedText: Stand on my tombstone to play a game.

name: Bird
text: I flap my wings a little in mid-air and I'm a lightweight.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to glide.

name: Firtree
text: I make my surroundings sticky.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to make your surroundings sticky.

name: Flame
text: I ignite fire-pits.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) to ignite a fire-pit.

name: Flower Pot
mission3: Drop 10 useful tombstones on acid drops
text: I grow my plant to help others get up.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to grow my flower and help others.

name: Koala
mission2: Sing on 3 voice wheels while hanging
text: I climb up and down sticky walls and even sing while stuck.
unlockedText: I walk up or down walls and can sing while hanging

name: Lamp
text: I shine like no other and reveal secrets.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to shine like no other.

name: Pear
text: I can hover still in mid-air.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to hover still in mid-air.

name: Seal
text: I smash the ground with my tail to destroy glass walls.
unlockedText: PUSH (button prompt) in mid-air to smash the ground.

name: Spinning Top
mission2: Speed up 20 mates with your tombstone
text: My tombstone gives a speed boost.
unlockedText: My tombstones speed you up when walked on.

name: Wolf
mission3: Drop 5 useful tombstones on floor traps
text: When I howl, teammates around me join my wolf pack and sing farther.
unlockedText: HOLD (button prompt) to howl in and transform my nearby mates into howlers.
